Posts.Content: Nov 1, 2012 02:35AM WestTXblond wrote: Thank you for your reply! I have an appointment next Monday afternoon, so I'll see what comes next. I may hear from the doc before then to set up a biopsy. I'm not saying a word to my kids, family, and boyfriend until I know for sure what's gonna be going on. My folks are elderly, my kids live out of state, and my boyfriend lost his wife to breast cancer 2 years ago. I'm going to be optimistic! Thanks again!

Posts.Content: Nov 9, 2012 06:00PM WestTXblond wrote: Well, I have had my diagnostic mammo/spot compression/ultrasound. It came back BI-RADS 4, stereotactic biopsy recommended. So...I'm waiting to hear back about when that will be. I'm trying not to let it bother me--too much! It may be nothing but a fibroid.
